Title: Ayakashi: Japanese Classic Horror
Description: ['A collection of three classic Japanese horror stories: "Yotsuya Kaidan", the story of a wife betrayed by her husband who seeks vengeance even in death. "Tenshu Monogatari", the story of forbidden love between a goddess and a human, and "Bakeneko", the story of a mysterious cat monster with a vendetta against a certain family. ', '\n', '\n']
Related: ['Prequel: Danganronpa: Kibou no Gakuen to Zetsubou no Koukousei The Animation', 'Sequel: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Mirai-hen']
Voices: ['Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Kuwashima, Houko', 'Hirata, Hiroaki', 'Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Yukana', 'Saka, Osamu', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Kamada, Kozue', 'Onosaka, Masaya']
